refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies Treo "foto" databases to current directory and extracts image files from within them.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Copies Treo "foto" databases to current directory and extracts the .jpg image files within them.

listitem.para: Write the database data to disk

Use device file port to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable.If neither are found or supplied, pilot-treofoto will print the usage information.
Display version of pilot-treofoto and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for pilot-treofoto and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: # connect to the Palm device and fetch all photos found in the Treo "foto" database, convert them to .jpg files and write them to disk on your local machine in the current working directory.
